content: अट् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (rarely A.) (अटति, आट, अटितुं, अटित). To wander or roam about (with <ab>loc.</ab>); roam over (sometimes with <ab>acc.</ab>); भो बटो भिक्षामट <ls>Sk.</ls> go to beg alms; आट नैकटिकाश्रमान् <ls>Bk. 4. 12</ls>; महीमटन् <ls>Dk. 38</ls> {%--<ab>desid.</ab>%} अटिटिषति ; {%--<ab>freq.</ab>%} अटाट्यते to wander about habitually, as a religious mendicant.
